resources.string: Not a Member yet? Sign Up here.

This is our local made video conferencing mobile application. Here user or creator can add 100+ users free of cost. It is developed by us for teachers, inistitutions,colleges,academic tutors, etc. Here we also try to add our own real time connection method for country and more security purpose. We Further Build New Products Related To Video Conferencing.
Upload the videos when wifi is available

We Krypto Developers Pvt Ltd Build This Project For Performing The Video Call Conference On Stable Manner. It Is Our Self Creation For Teachers,Students,Institutions,etc. It Is Very Important Tool For On Going Situation And Upcoming Situation.
Got any queries? We are happy to help! Please Email Us
In this application user can create the meeting on Intant/Future basis.

In Instant Meet, an user can make instant video conference where he/she need to share the information with the other users, and the users can join the video conference with the help of meeting id provided.

In Future meet, an user need to set the information of future meeting along with date and time and after that he/she can share the information with the other users who will join the video conference using meeting id provided.
In this application, the user can view the meeting history on the basis of Joining Mode and Instant Mode, as here they can clear the history as well.
In Pick Date, an user select the meet on the basis of date and start meeting, as during meeting creation he/she need to share the future meeting information to all the users.
Please Make Feedback, Do Share The Application and Rate Our Application. As on the basis of ur suggestion we develop features on our application.
